```python
import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):
    page.title = "Flet counter example"
    page.vertical_alignment = ft.MainAxisAlignment.CENTER

    txt_number = ft.TextField(value="0", text_align=ft.TextAlign.RIGHT, width=100)

    def minus_click(e):
        txt_number.value = str(int(txt_number.value) - 1)
        page.update()

    def plus_click(e):
        txt_number.value = str(int(txt_number.value) + 1)
        page.update()

    page.add(
        ft.Row(
            [
                ft.IconButton(ft.icons.REMOVE, on_click=minus_click),
                txt_number,
                ft.IconButton(ft.icons.ADD, on_click=plus_click),
            ],
            alignment=ft.MainAxisAlignment.CENTER,
        )
    )

ft.app(target=main)
```

```python
def minus_click(e):
        txt_number.value = str(int(txt_number.value) - 1)
        if int(txt_number.value) < 0:
            txt_number.value = "0"
        page.update()
```

```python
import flet as ft
```

```python
def main(page: ft.Page):
    def add_numbers(e):
        result.value = int(num1.value) + int(num2.value)
        result.update()

    num1 = ft.TextField(label="æ•°å­—1")
    num2 = ft.TextField(label="æ•°å­—2")
    num_row = ft.Row(controls=[num1, num2])

    add_button = ft.FilledButton(text="ADD", on_click=add_numbers)
    result = ft.Text()

    page.add(num_row, add_button, result)

ft.app(target=main)
```

```python
def add_numbers(e):
        result.value = int(num1.value) + int(num2.value)
        result.update()
```

```python
        result.value = int(num1.value) + int(num2.value)
        result.update()
```

```python
import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):
    # page.horizontal_alignment=ft.CrossAxisAlignment.CENTER

    # ãƒ†ã‚­ã‚¹ãƒˆã‚³ãƒ³ãƒˆãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã‚’ä½œæˆ
    text_control = ft.Text(value="", size=35)

    # ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³ãŒæŠ¼ã•ã‚ŒãŸæ™‚ã®ã‚¤ãƒ™ãƒ³ãƒˆãƒãƒ³ãƒ‰ãƒ©
    def button_clicked(e):
        button_name = e.control.text
        text_control.value = button_name + "ãŒæŠ¼ã•ã‚Œã¾ã—ãŸ"
        text_control.update()

    # ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚’ä½œæˆ
    button1 = ft.FilledButton(text="ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³1", on_click=button_clicked)
    button2 = ft.FilledButton(text="ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³B", on_click=button_clicked)
    button3 = ft.FilledButton(text="ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³â…¢", on_click=button_clicked)

    # ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚’æ¨ªä¸¦ã³ã«é…ç½®
    button_row = ft.Row(
        controls=[button1, button2, button3],
        alignment=ft.MainAxisAlignment.CENTER
    )

    main_container = ft.Container(
        content=ft.Column(
            controls=[
                button_row,
                text_control,
            ],
            horizontal_alignment=ft.CrossAxisAlignment.CENTER
        ),
        height=250,
        padding=20,
        border=ft.border.all(2, ft.colors.BLACK),
    )

    # ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã«è¦ç´ ã‚’è¿½åŠ 
    page.add(main_container)

# Fletã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒªã‚’å®Ÿè¡Œ
ft.app(target=main)
```
